dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: oh, sorry, my eyes ain't what they used to be

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: well, you look like you need some help

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: the forest might not take kindly to a traveler showing up unprepared

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: grab that blade over there, it is not as sharp as it used to be...

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: though it should give you the spark of a chance if you tap the 'X' button

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: if you're nervous, try to take it for a spin on that scarecrow down there

dialogue.speaker: zahir, the first shrine keeper
dialogue.dialogue_line: may you find what you are looking for...
